snippet: Mitt Romney's campaign will announce Wednesday that it raised $24 million in the fourth quarter of 2011 and is going into 2012 with more than $19 million cash on hand.
abstract: Mitt Romney's campaign will announce Wednesday that it raised $24 million in the fourth quarter of 2011 and is going into 2012 with more than $19 million cash on hand.

headline.main: Romney Raised $24 Million in Last Quarter
